item.title: How to test the APIs of your Go-Gin service?
item.description: As the pre-post said, Gin is a famouse web framework writen by Go. I love it and always use it. When I wrote a web server using Go-Gin, how do I test the APIs? This may confused me, only use a command-line tool to verify them? It’s seems ridiculous and non-product. We need to have a full-check for the APIs and it’s better to make it automatic, then we need
